statements: SELECT * FROM access_control;
SELECT user_id, device_id, access_level FROM access_control;
SELECT device_id, access_level, user_id FROM access_control;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT device_id, user_id FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, access_level FROM access_control WHERE access_level = 'admin' ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, user_id, access_level FROM access_control WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY access_level;
SELECT device_id, access_level FROM access_control WHERE access_level LIKE '%user%' ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE access_level IN ('admin', 'manager') ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_control_list;
SELECT id, device_id FROM access_control_list WHERE access_level = 'ADMIN';
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM access_control_list ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM authentication_data WHERE last_login > '2021-01-01';
SELECT username, last_login FROM authentication_data WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE access_level = 'ADMIN';
SELECT id, user_id FROM access_control_list WHERE device_id = 123 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, last_login FROM authentication_data WHERE user_id = 456 AND last_login > '2021-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT access_level FROM access_control_list ORDER BY access_level;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS login_count FROM authentication_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING login_count > 3 ORDER BY login_count DESC;
SELECT device_id, access_level, permission FROM access_control_list;
SELECT user_id, username FROM authentication_data ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM iot_devices WHERE connection_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM authentication_data WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT device_id, device_name, connection_status FROM iot_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT device_id, permission FROM access_control_list ORDER BY permission DESC;
SELECT * FROM authentication_data JOIN iot_devices ON authentication_data.user_id = iot_devices.device_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM authentication_data;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM iot_devices WHERE connection_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM access_control
SELECT device_id, user_id, permission_level FROM access_control WHERE permission_level > 2
SELECT device_id, device_name, manufacturer FROM device_list ORDER BY manufacturer ASC
SELECT user_id, username FROM authentication WHERE username LIKE 'admin%'
SELECT device_id, status FROM device_status WHERE status = TRUE
SELECT username, password FROM authentication WHERE username = 'admin'
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM device_list ORDER BY manufacturer DESC
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM access_control WHERE permission_level > 2
SELECT device_id, device_name, manufacturer FROM device_list JOIN device_status ON device_list.device_id = device_status.device_id
SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM acl_lists;
SELECT id, device_id, user_id, permission FROM authentication_data;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT id, device_id, log_timestamp FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = 2 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Phone' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT device_id, user_id, permission FROM acl_lists WHERE permission != 'admin' AND device_id = 2;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE location LIKE '%room%' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT id, log_timestamp FROM device_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2021-10-01 00:00:00' AND log_timestamp <= '2021-10-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
